data.title: Zenith's Shadow
data.statement:
Max has a [[W]] per [[L]] meters lawn on which there are [[N]] bushy trees.
Today, each of the [[N]] bushy trees have a specific radius [[r]] (circular) foliage, casting him shadow.

Output the unshaded area [[S]] when the sun is at its zenith.
data.constraints:
For simplicity, Max's lawn is at the correct latitude, and it's the right day to calculate,
The sun is considered to be directly above the trees at solar noon (Zenith),
In these test cases, there will be no shadow outside the lawn,
And the tree shadows are never over-lapping.
1 <= [[W]] <= 50
1 <= [[L]] <= 50
0 <= [[N]] <= 25
0 <= [[r]] <= 2.5
data.stubGenerator:
read W:int L:int
read N:int
loop N read r:float
write answer

STATEMENT
Output the unshaded area when the sun is at its Zenith, rounded to 2 decimals.

INPUT
W: W and L are Max's land Width and Lenght
N: N is the number of bushy trees
r: r is the specific radius (circular) foliage of this tree

OUTPUT
Output the unshaded area when the sun is at its Zenith, rounded to 2 decimals.
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Two integers [[W]] and [[L]] for Max's land <<W>>idth and <<L>>enght,

<<Line 2:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of trees.

<<Next [[N]] lines:>> One float [[r]] for the foliage <<r>>adius around the tree.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> The unshaded area [[S]] when the sun is at its zenith, rounded to <<2>> decimals.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Max has a W per L meters lawn on which there are N bushy trees.
Today, each of the N bushy trees have a specific radius r (circular) foliage, casting him shadow.

Output the unshaded area S when the sun is at its zenith.
Input
Line 1: Two integers W and L for Max's land Width and Lenght,

Line 2: An integer N for the number of trees.

Next N lines: One float r for the foliage radius around the tree.
Output
Line 1 : The unshaded area S when the sun is at its zenith, rounded to 2 decimals.
Constraints
For simplicity, Max's lawn is at the correct latitude, and it's the right day to calculate,
The sun is considered to be directly above the trees at solar noon (Zenith),
In these test cases, there will be no shadow outside the lawn,
And the tree shadows are never over-lapping.
1 <= W <= 50
1 <= L <= 50
0 <= N <= 25
0 <= r <= 2.5
Example
Input
1 1
1
0.5
Output
0.21
